name: dvct
description: Data value chain tracker with incentive distribution through blockchain

scripts.deps-npm: cd incentive/blockchain && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.initialize: cd incentive/blockchain && yarn && npx hardhat compile && cp -R ./typechain-types ../api/src/typechain-types && cd ../api && yarn
scripts.pretest:integration: cd incentive/blockchain && npx hardhat compile && cd ../api && npm run build
scripts.test:integration: concurrently "npm run start:node" "sleep 5 && npx ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json --timeout 60000 'e2e-tests/integration/!(*scenario-generic).test.ts'" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:scenario-1: concurrently "npm run start:node" "sleep 5 && npx ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json --timeout 60000 'e2e-tests/integration/scenario-1.test.ts'" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:scenario-2: concurrently "npm run start:node" "sleep 5 && npx ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json --timeout 60000 'e2e-tests/integration/scenario-2.test.ts'" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:scenario-3: concurrently "npm run start:node" "sleep 5 && npx ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json --timeout 60000 'e2e-tests/integration/scenario-3.test.ts'" --kill-others --success first
